subject: Re: Junit crowd funding campaign
msgSnippet: Mairead, thanks for your interest in our crowdfunding campaign! The logo will be visible for as long as we will be working on the campaign – at least until
messageBody:
Mairead,

thanks for your interest in our crowdfunding campaign!

The logo will be visible for as long as we will be working on the campaign – at least until mid-2016.

Please feel free to contact me directly if you have more questions.

Cheers, Marc
